mcp.title: Ayyukan AI
mcp.footer: Samun sabis ya dogara ne da wurinka
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} cikin {total} sabis na nan a wurinka

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Gano cututtukan shuka da maganinsu ta amfani da AI
agrivision.description: Duba hotunan shuka don gano cututtuka, kwari, da rashin sinadarai. Samu shawarar magani nan take da kuma hanyoyin kariya.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Soil
isdaSoil.tagline: Halayen ∆ôasa da binciken sinadaran abinci ga Afirka
isdaSoil.description: Samu cikakken bayanin ∆ôasa ciki har da pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, da sauran sinadarai. Ya shafi duk fa…óin Afirka tare da tsarin mita 30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Yanayin yanzu da hasashen yanayi na duniya baki …óaya
accuweather.description: Samu bayanan yanayi na ainihin lokaci ciki har da zafin jiki, danshi, gudun iska, da ruwan sama. Hasashe yana samuwa har zuwa kwana 15.

gapWeather.name: GAP Weather
gapWeather.description: Ke…ìa…ì…ìen hasashen yanayi don noma a Kenya. Ya ha…óa da evapotranspiration, radiation na rana, da hasashen ruwan sama wa…óanda aka ke…ìance don yanke shawara a harkar noma.

edacap.name: EDACaP Climate
edacap.tagline: Hasashen yanayi na lokaci-lokaci ga Habasha
edacap.description: Hasashen yanayi na lokaci-lokaci ciki har da zafin jiki da hasashen ruwan sama. Yana taimaka wa manoma su tsara lokutan shuka da girbi.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Bayanin yanayi na wurare a fa…óin duniya
weatherapi.description: Cikakken sabis na bayanan yanayi wanda ke ba da yanayin yanzu da hasashe ga wurare a fa…óin duniya.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Ingantaccen tsarin binciken yanayi tare da hasashe mai zurfi da kuma iya hango yanayin yanzu.

feedFormulation.name: Ha…óin Abincin Dabbobi
feedFormulation.tagline: ∆òididdigar abinci mafi dacewa ga shanu masu nono
feedFormulation.description: ∆òididdige abincin dabbobi mafi araha ga shanu masu nono. Yana la'akari da burin samar da nono, nauyin jiki, da abincin dabbobi na gida da ke akwai.

nextgen.name: NextGen Taki
nextgen.tagline: Shawarwarin takin zamani na musamman ga kowanne wuri a Habasha
nextgen.description: Samu ingantattun shawarwarin taki dangane da ainihin wurinka. Ya ha…óa da shawarwarin taki na halitta (kamar takin gargajiya, vermicompost) da na sinadarai (kamar Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Tsarin Shawarwarin Noma
decisionTree.tagline: Shawarwari dangane da matakin girma ga Kenya
decisionTree.description: Samu shawarwarin kula da amfanin gona dangane da matakin girma da yanayin yanzu. Yana taimaka maka yanke shawara a kan lokaci game da maganin kwari, ban ruwa, da girbi.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Agriculture
gapAgriculture.description: Gaba…óaya ayyukan shawarwarin noma don kula da amfanin gona da dabbobi.
